resources.string: Ace=Face \n Each player must touch their face and the last person to do so must take a drink
The last person to touch their face must drink.
The person who gets this card chooses somebody else to drink.
The person who gets this card must drink.
The last person to touch the floor must drink.
All the guys in the game must drink.
All the girls in the game must drink.
The last person to raise their hand must drink.
The person who gets this card picks another player in the game, every time one of these players drinks the other player must also drink.
"The person who gets this card must say a rhyme, each player,going from the persons left-hand-side must continue the rhyme, whoever fails to do so must drink."
The person who gets this card must start drinking, followed all the other players in order starting on the players left-hand-side.
The person who gets this card must make a rule, any player that breaks this rule must drink the rule is replaced once another rule is made).
The person who picks this card is the quiz-master, anyone who answers a question asked by the \'quiz-master\' must drink.

"For each of the first 3 kings everyone must pour a small bit of their drink into the jug/glass/saucepan/bowl in the centre of the table. Whoever gets the final king must drink and finish this drink."
Who ever drew the final king from the deck must drink the jug and take a picture of themselves
